name: Eclipse: Night
description:
Take control of Lunar end try to escape the beast to spread the night into the world.

Game made in 5 days for a private Game Jam.

Let's play the other version of the game too! : https://zerth0.itch.io/eclipse-day

WARNING: Only playable with a controller !
